title: US Stocks Slip as Risk-Off Sentiment Hits Big Tech, Lifts Energy
description: The S&P 500 Index fell on Monday amid intensifying unease about volatile asset moves and geopolitical tensions. Nvidia Corp. and Palantir Technologies Inc. were among the top decliners by volume as the two were featured in stories wrapping the biggest trades of the year.
content: The S&P 500 Index fell on Monday amid intensifying unease about volatile asset moves and geopolitical tensions. Nvidia Corp. and Palantir Technologies Inc. were among the top decliners by volume as the two were featured in stories wrapping the biggest trades of the year.
